Problem: After a certain amount of time i'm finding that no matter what i do, fast forward, load an earlier save or even remove the mods. the contract in offered will either disappear completely or when the time count down for the expire deadline, it just goes blank and they don't change. And if the don't disappear with the blank expire time, if i decline any it just removes one from the list until i have no more.

This is really annoying as i've had to reinstall the game and start over 3 times, so i was just wondering if anyone else have had this problem and if anyone knows of a way to fix the problem.
